legend: 1. (1,3) across: A heroic champion or paragon of chivalry.. 2. (2,2) down: Musical instrument with 46 or more open strings played byplucking.. 3. (4,1) across: A solid cylinder or disk that fits snugly in a larger cylinder and moves under pressure as in an engine.. 4. (6,1) down: A snide, slightly stifled laugh.. 5. (1,6) down: A strand of twisted threads or a long elaborate narrative.. 6. (1,7) across: A large bird of the ocean having a hooked beek and long,narrow wings.. 7. (4,6) down: The time of each morning at which daylight begins.. 8. (8,5) down: A mass of fine water droplets in the air near or in contact withthe ground.
